title: My First Post, Yo!
author: Rupak Dey
content:
#### Welcome to My Blog. 

*It's a beautiful thing.* I hope you'll have as much fun reading my posts as I have writing them. Well, before we go any further, allow me to introduce myself. I'm Dave Jones. I'm 34, and from Montreal, Canada.

title: Hello All...
author: Rupak Dey
content:
#### Hey Everyone!

_Follow My Blog for such unique content._

_My blog is better than Dave's._

You may know me from my other blog, "No Sleep Till Deployment", which is all about my life as a senior developer at a large tech company.
